Paint

Class ToolMenuInputsRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.HBox
              • Paint.ToolMenuInputsRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ToolMenuInputsRow
extends javafx.scene.layout.HBox
    prompts the input for selected row. Allows the user to enter how much to rotate and certain text and the number of sides on a polygon
